successes.title: TruForce Collectibles: Mega Man X Action Figure
successes.description: Behold! An all new, unique rendition of the iconic blue android himself...X, from Mega Man X!

Pledges.description: Mega Man X High Five – Thanks for your contribution! We’re one step closer to reaching our goal!
TruForce Collectibles shirt – A cool shirt to commemorate our brand and new figure! Tell us your size.

*International Shipping - Add $15*
TruForce Collectibles shirt – A cool shirt to commemorate our brand and new figure! Tell us your size.

TruForce Collectibles Shirt and an amazing print of X's brand new Rider Chaser as drawn by the same Capcom artist who drew X! This illustration will be the proposed design for our next product to accompany X.

*International Shipping - Add $15* 
TruForce Collectibles Shirt and an amazing print of X's brand new Rider Chaser as drawn by the same Capcom artist who drew X! This illustration will be the proposed design for our next product to accompany X.

This is the one you’ve been waiting for… our X figure! Consider this your pre-order. This is the full complete figure as listed above. You will receive your figure exclusively before we ship to dealers.

*International Shipping - Add $15*
This is the one you’ve been waiting for… our X figure! Consider this your pre-order. This is the full complete figure as listed above. You will receive your figure exclusively before we ship to dealers.
You get an exclusive kickstarter color variant of X…a ‘test armor version’ featuring a sleek silver and orange color scheme!

*International Shipping - Add $15* 
You get an exclusive kickstarter color variant of X…a ‘test armor version’ featuring a sleek silver and orange color scheme!
You get our X figure, the shirt and the print!

*International Shipping - Add $20*
You get our X figure, the shirt and the print!
You get BOTH the original figure of X AND the exclusive kickstarter color variant available no where else!

*International Shipping - Add $15* 
You get BOTH the original figure of X AND the exclusive kickstarter color variant available no where else!

This is a big one…you get the X figure, shirt and print AND an exclusive kickstarter color variant of X…a ‘test armor version’ featuring a sleek silver and orange color scheme! The perfect way to show your support during this production phase we’re in. The packaging also sports a complimentary color theme!

*International Shipping - Add $20*

The perfect way to show your support during this production phase we’re in. The packaging also sports a complimentary color theme!
